site.name: BuildSupply Pro
site.description: Your trusted partner for quality construction tools, safety equipment, and building materials. Serving contractors and subcontractors nationwide.

hero.title: Professional Construction Equipment & Supplies
hero.subtitle: Quality tools and materials for contractors who demand excellence. Net payment terms available for qualified businesses.

testimonials.name: Mike Rodriguez
testimonials.text: BuildSupply Pro has been our go-to supplier for 5 years. Their net terms and volume pricing help us manage cash flow on big projects.

testimonials.name: Sarah Chen
testimonials.text: Fast delivery and quality products. Their account management team really understands our business needs.

testimonials.name: Dave Thompson
testimonials.text: Great selection of Milwaukee tools and competitive pricing. The online ordering system makes restocking easy.

creditTerms.title: Flexible Payment Terms
creditTerms.description: Net 30, 60, or 90-day terms for qualified businesses

volumePricing.title: Volume Discounts
volumePricing.description: Save more when you buy more with our tier pricing

fastShipping.title: Fast Delivery
fastShipping.description: Same-day shipping on orders placed before 2PM

accountManager.title: Dedicated Support
accountManager.description: Personal account manager for all your business needs
